item.description:
Join us for a night of great Japanese...Hibachi Style at Ichiro in Trumbull. A night of great food, great entertainment and great company!

The chef will dazzle you with his style of cooking...right at our table! You can choose from the extensive menu and it's cooked right before your eyes in a blaze of fire..mesmerizing and delicious. A vast array of seafood, meats and sushi is served here at Ichiro...all delicious and fresh.

So come on out and join us...for the fun of it!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...
item.name: ICHIRO...Japanese, Hibachi Style...
